Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL
Reviews.Author: KORRICE
Reviews.Content: this phone is so slim and sleek fits in ur hand perfect... when i first saw it i thought wow that screen would be difficult to type on but its actually great for my fingers but i prefer to flip it and u it side ways to type.. the colour is also nice the flash player works perfect and the upgrade is the best part cause more features come to live... i love my xperia ray

Reviews.Title: Xperia is very handy
Reviews.Author: Surya4u
Reviews.Content: This is very nice phone and very handy. It is very slim and sleek perfectly fits in hand. with very stylish color.Very good touch response with latest gingerbread version.

Reviews.Title: I've had it for a couple of days
Reviews.Author: A. B
Reviews.Content: Love  this phone so far, it takes a little bit to respond when you tn it on but it responds normally to all actions after that. I've had it for a couple of days only so we will see how it goes :)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: So basically got this phone, and can't stop playing with it.I like it, so I got the Xperia arc from this provider again.

Reviews.Title: Best of all worlds.
Reviews.Author: inj
Reviews.Content: I love SE, and I miss them. I loved my old SE W595 more than the iphone 4 I had till now.SE speakers are especially great, the music lights up your room.
